{"id":624757987,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1642787676,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"10 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/624757987/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Champagne Tower","memory":"10.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double champagneTower(int poured, int query_row, int query_glass) {\n        vector<vector<double>> tower(query_row + 1, vector<double> (query_glass + 2, 0));\n        tower[0][0] = poured;\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < query_row; i++)\n        {\n            for(int j = 0; j <= query_glass; j++)\n            {\n                double leak = max(0.0, (tower[i][j] - 1) / 2);\n                tower[i + 1][j] += leak;\n                tower[i + 1][j + 1] += leak;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return min(1.0, tower[query_row][query_glass]);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"champagne-tower"}
